page.title: 11LIFE STYLES IN CRANHAM
page.content:
The fashion of today is to get an individual look. Young people in Cranham like to wear designer clothes such as{Kappa,Fila and Nike.}These clothes are expensive. People today tend to be more concerned with their weight and health. The family tends to buy low fat food and there are three health shops in Upminster High Street.
Most young people like pop music. The most popular groups are:{Wham,Duran {Duran and Spandau Ballet.}The most popular pop music programme is Top of the Pops.
Most families tend to go abroad for their holidays. Most people own their own homes.
